text: Andrew Henry Vachss (October 19, 1942 â€“ December 27, 2021) was an American crime fiction writer and child protection lawyer. He was born in New York City. He was known for writing Batman: The Ultimate Evil for Warner Books in 1995. He also wrote the 1987 detective book Strega. Vachss died on December 27, 2021 at the age of 79.Writer Andrew Vachss died ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American comics writers Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:American activists Category:Writers from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Crime writers
